name: RSLT_REPEAT_RTF_VAL_PTR
description: This table containers a list of lines for rich text values for repeat components on the result from the RSLT_RTF_VAL_STG table.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the result record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the repeat of a component on the result from the RES_REPEAT_COMPONENT table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple rich text values for the repeat of a component on the result from the RSLT_RTF_VAL_STG table.

columns.name: VALUE_GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of a specific line of rich text value for the repeat of a component on the result from the RSLT_RTF_VAL_STG table.
